messages.content: ComfyUI-SegMoE is an unofficial implementation of SegMoE for ComfyUI.
Which models are supported by the ðŸŽ©SegMoE Model Loader node?
The ðŸŽ©SegMoE Model Loader node supports SegMoE 2x1, SegMoE 4x2, and SegMoE SD 4x2 models. Users can input the model name and it will be automatically downloaded.
What are the parameters that can be adjusted in the ðŸŽ©SegMoE Generation node?
The ðŸŽ©SegMoE Generation node allows users to adjust the pipe, positive and negative prompts, number of steps, guidance scale, width, height, and seed.
What is the recommended VRAM for using ComfyUI-SegMoE?
It is recommended to have VRAM greater than 20GB when using ComfyUI-SegMoE.
What is the default number of steps in the ðŸŽ©SegMoE Generation node?
The default number of steps in the ðŸŽ©SegMoE Generation node is 30.
Users can install ComfyUI-SegMoE using the ComfyUI Manager (recommended) or manually by cloning the repository and installing the requirements.
How long does it take to generate an image using ComfyUI-SegMoE with an A100 GPU?
With an A100 GPU, it takes approximately 17 seconds to generate an image using ComfyUI-SegMoE with 50 steps.
